# Sense Spirit Magic (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Area:** 30-ft.-radius emanation centered on you

**Duration:** 24 hours

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 191

You gain greater sensitivity to magic associated with your primary spirit and wandering spirits (any spells on the spirit magic spell lists for these spirits, as well as spell-like abilities that duplicate the effects of those spells). You gain a +10 circumstance bonus on [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] checks to identify these spells if they are cast within the area, and a +2 circumstance bonus on saving throws to resist the effects of such spells. If any of these spells require an attack roll, you are never considered [[Flat-Footed|flat-footed]] against such attacks.
